quote: Your time is now. Start where you stand and never back down!
author: ~ Tom Hopkins

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
author: ~ Alice Walker

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: ~ C.S. Lewis

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: ~ Sam Levenson

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: ~ Christian D. Larson

quote: The question isn’t who’s going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
author: ~ Ayn Rand

quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
author: ~ Amelia Earhart

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: ~ Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
author: ~ Coco Chanel

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: ~ Charles Kingsleigh

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: ~ Steve Jobs

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: ~ John D. Rockefeller

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: ~ Mark Twain

quote: Do not bring people in your life who weigh you down. And trust your instincts ... good relationships feel good. They feel right. They don’t hurt.
author: ~ Oprah Winfrey

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: ~ Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I do not wish women to have power over men; but over themselves.
author: ~ Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Bootstrap is a headache. Proceed with caution.
author: ~ Mahir

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: ~ Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The only way to deal with fear is to face it head-on.
author: ~ Nancy Pelosi

quote: Raw milk is the best!
author: ~ Dan

quote: I raise up my voice—not so I can shout, but so that those without a voice can be heard.
author: ~ Malala Yousafzai

quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down.
author: ~ Chantal Sutherland

quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.
author: ~ Chantal Sutherland

quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
author: ~ Maya Angelou
